casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jesse James LENOIR 194P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 6, 2018 Mr. W. Michael Spivey, Rocky Mount, Attorney at Law, for Lenoir, Jesse James Ms. Kimberly Grande, Raleigh, Special Counsel, for State of North Carolina

Mr. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General

Mr. Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina Mr. Ted Bell, District Attorney, for State

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of July 2018 by State of NC to Dissolve Temporary Stay and Withdraw Petition for Writ of Supersedeas:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of July 2018."
